item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, December 12, 2024 at 7:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Gukesh becomes the youngest chess world champion in history (540 points | 229 comments)
2. Fermat's Last Theorem – how it's going (151 points | 72 comments)
3. The Rise and Fall of Ashton-Tate (2023) (19 points | 5 comments)
4. Timemap.org – Interactive Map of History (538 points | 102 comments)
5. Android XR (130 points | 127 comments)
6. Bitbanging 1D Reversible Automata (10 points | discuss)
7. Programming Language Memory Models (2021) (41 points | 10 comments)
8. Show HN: Lfi – a lazy functional sync, async, and concurrent iteration library (33 points | 10 comments)
9. Doctor Who theme: Ron Grainer (composer) Delia Derbyshire (musician, arranger) (53 points | 23 comments)
10. Great Question (YC W21) Is Hiring People Operations Manager ( | hide)
11. Converting untrusted PDFs into trusted ones: The Qubes Way (2013) (8 points | 1 comment)
12. Show HN: Quantus – LeetCode for Financial Modeling (141 points | 37 comments)
13. Show HN: Kubernetes Spec Explorer (74 points | 13 comments)
14. A middle schooler found a new compound in a piece of goose poop (79 points | 30 comments)
15. Show HN: Bring-your-own-key browser extension for summarizing HN posts with LLMs (10 points | 4 comments)
16. FCC opens entire 6 GHz band to low power device operations (689 points | 270 comments)
17. BlenderGPT (234 points | 123 comments)
18. Show HN: Credit reports about German companies (17 points | 2 comments)
19. Gemini 2.0: our new AI model for the agentic era (935 points | 461 comments)
20. Canada euthanasia now accounts for nearly one in 20 deaths (102 points | 98 comments)
21. Mysterious New Jersey drone sightings prompt call for 'state of emergency' (403 points | 717 comments)
22. Show HN: Gentrace – connect to your LLM app code and run/eval it from a UI (10 points | discuss)
23. "Rules" that terminal programs follow (4 points | discuss)
24. Parkinson's Law: It’s real, so use it (86 points | 79 comments)
25. Freshly Remember'd: Kirk Drift (2017) (4 points | discuss)
26. The FDA Hasn't Inspected This Drug Factory After 7 Recalls for the Same Flaw (95 points | 42 comments)
27. Microsoft Recall still storing credit card, social security numbers (33 points | 2 comments)
28. A simple math error sparked a panic about black plastic kitchen utensils (67 points | 71 comments)
29. Ham Radio All-in-One-Cable (209 points | 45 comments)
30. Review of Mullvad VPN (438 points | 173 comments)
